title: "How AI-Generated Content Can Undermine Your Thinking Skills"
excerpt: "AI-generated content is increasingly common; up to 90 percent of all content could be AI-generated by 2026. Much of this content is mis- or disinformation, prompting concerns over AI's societal impact. Critical thinking remains essential to minimize the risk of manipulation."
